title: The Trigger of an Idea
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>You-chan, Ruby wants to return the book Ruby borrowed from you. Thanks for lending it to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, you finished it? How was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It was really good! There are so many different uniforms on it that Ruby wants to reference for our next outfit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Right!? I knew you would understand, Ruby-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Ruby was especially interested in the one on this page.... this one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>The flight attendant uniform, huh! I’ve also always wanted to imitate the scarf and the hat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s right, it would be cute if everyone had a different color scarf, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah, and we can wrap the scarf slightly differently for the 9 of us too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waaah, that would definitely be cute! Uuuh, Ruby is starting to get itchy.... You-chan, how about we start thinking about our outfit design for the next live right away?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Sure, let’s do that! I’m starting to get a few ideas popping up now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
